message.content:
Here's the logic behind this:
1. When you were 6 years old, your sister was half your age. So she would have been 3 years old at that time.
2. As you grow older, so does your sister. She also grows by 40 years for every year you age.
3. Now that you are 80 years old, your sister is 40 years older than when you were 6.
4. Therefore, she must be (3 + 40) = 43 years old now.
